title: Virgin Islands National Park: Park Fun
body: Park Fun       As this part of the Virgin Islands National Park website is developed, it will link to online activities created especially for kids. Visit us again to see what you can learn about the Park!  For now, put on your make-believe snorkel equipment and join this smiling Parrotfish for a swim: Online Snorkel Trips. If you’d like to learn more about what kids can do during a visit to the Park, go to our For Kids site.      For Kids  Be a Junior Ranger Park Fun Online Snorkel Trips  Online Snorkel Trip: Fish & Turtles Online Snorkel Trip: Corals, Sponges & Creepy Crawlies
